trans-unit.source: Certain conditions must be met for <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> to be able to load the new classes right away without your having to reboot.

seg-source.mrk: Certain conditions must be met for <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> to be able to load the new classes right away without your having to reboot.

target.mrk: Certain conditions must be met for <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> to be able to load the new classes right away without your having to reboot.

trans-unit.source: You originally configured database-level class loading for the database correctly. Turning on the database-level class loading property requires setting the derby.database.classpath property with valid two-part names, then rebooting.

seg-source.mrk: You originally configured database-level class loading for the database correctly.
Turning on the database-level class loading property requires setting the derby.database.classpath property with valid two-part names, then rebooting.

target.mrk: You originally configured database-level class loading for the database correctly.
Turning on the database-level class loading property requires setting the derby.database.classpath property with valid two-part names, then rebooting.

trans-unit.source: If changes to the derby.database.classpath property are needed to reflect new jar files, you change the property to a valid value.

seg-source.mrk: If changes to the derby.database.classpath property are needed to reflect new jar files, you change the property to a valid value.

target.mrk: If changes to the derby.database.classpath property are needed to reflect new jar files, you change the property to a valid value.

trans-unit.source: If these requirements are not met, you will have to reboot to see the changes.

seg-source.mrk: If these requirements are not met, you will have to reboot to see the changes.

target.mrk: If these requirements are not met, you will have to reboot to see the changes.
